price: Na tukaacha humo Ishara kwa ajili ya wanao iogopa adhabu chungu.
arabic: وَتَرَكۡنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ
footnotes: Na katika mji huo tumeacha alama ya maangamizo ya watu wake, ili wapate kuzingatia wanayo ikhofu adhabu chungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wataraknā fīhā āyatan lilladhīna yakhāfūna al-ʿadhāba al-alīma
